channel.title: cash burn on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in cash burn on FinanClub

item.title: APE
item.description: score:72 Chances: AMC Entertainment’s revised stockholder settlement was approved, clearing the way for the company to sell more shares and pay down some of its debt. AMC reported second-quarter results that beat analyst estimates on both the top and bottom lines, with the third quarter off to an ’explosive start’ due to strong movie performance.

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:147 Chances: Rivian reported a narrower-than-anticipated loss in the second quarter and raised its production guidance, indicating positive operational performance. Rivian’s production guidance increase to 52,000 vehicles from 50,000 showcases the company’s ability to meet demand and grow. Rivian’s stock has experienced a significant rally over the past 90 days, driven by growing demand for its electric pickup and SUV.
